use_case: Complete business automation for catering businesses including lead generation, appointment booking, and customer retention
target_audience: Catering business owners, food & beverage professionals
author: Multiple Providers

description.overview: Industry-specific automation system designed for catering businesses. Includes lead capture funnels, automated follow-up sequences, appointment booking, customer communication workflows, and review generation. Built on proven best practices for the catering industry.
key_benefits: Pipeline for tracking leads to customers
ideal_for: Catering businesses wanting to automate operations
New catering businesses needing a complete system
Established food & beverage companies looking to scale

funnels.name: Catering Quote Request Funnel
funnels.purpose: Collect quote requests and service details

workflows.name: New Lead Welcome Sequence
workflows.purpose: Engage leads immediately with multi-channel outreach

pipelines.name: Catering Sales Pipeline
pipelines.purpose: Track leads through entire customer journey
